misc.title: The very first time, it was also Imu who was attacked by fire (Sabo). What I find interesting is that Imu (if it is him) holds the sun in his hand (Mother Flame); I wouldn't be surprised if he created
misc.text: The very first time, it was also Imu who was attacked by fire (Sabo). What I find interesting is that Imu (if it is him) holds the sun in his hand (Mother Flame); I wouldn't be surprised if he created that to counter Sun God Nika's powers. Stussy Sama - Dawn&Dusk (@DawnStussy) ã€The Possibility of Gear 6ã€‘ Kaido says: â€˜If his rubber starts affecting other things, then you could say thatâ€™s Paramecia awakening. But something feels off. Transformations like that are supposed to be the specialty of Zoan types.â€™ From this, we can understand that the Nika Devil Fruit seems to possess traits of both a Zoan and a Paramecia. If thatâ€™s the case, then it raises an interesting possibility â€” if it were to awaken even further, could it also gain Logia-like abilities? And that power might be fire. The battle between Ace and Blackbeard was described as â€œthe sun versus darkness,â€ and the so-called â€œundying flameâ€ is referred to as the â€œMother Flame.â€ All of this suggests that in the world of One Piece, fire symbolizes the sun. If thatâ€™s true, then it makes perfect sense that Nika is called the â€œSUN GODâ€ â€” https://nitter.net/DawnStussy/status/2023813208910463091#m

The battle between Ace and Blackbeard was described as â€œthe sun versus darkness,â€ and the so-called â€œundying flameâ€ is referred to as the â€œMother Flame.â€ All of this suggests that in the world of One Piece, fire symbolizes the sun. If thatâ€™s true, then it makes perfect sense that Nika is called the â€œSUN GODâ€ Clairvoyant (@ClairvoyantEye1) #ONEPIECE How would you guys feel about Gear 6 being all fire? ğŸ¤” Video â€” https://nitter.net/ClairvoyantEye1/status/2023803490854916226#m

items.text: The very first time, it was also Imu who was attacked by fire (Sabo). What I find interesting is that Imu (if it is him) holds the sun in his hand (Mother Flame); I wouldn't be surprised if he created that to counter Sun God Nika's powers. Stussy Sama - Dawn&Dusk (@DawnStussy) ã€The Possibility of Gear 6ã€‘ Kaido says: â€˜If his rubber starts affecting other things, then you could say thatâ€™s Paramecia awakening. But something feels off. Transformations like that are supposed to be the specialty of Zoan types.â€™ From this, we can understand that the Nika Devil Fruit seems to possess traits of both a Zoan and a Paramecia. If thatâ€™s the case, then it raises an interesting possibility â€” if it were to awaken even further, could it also gain Logia-like abilities? And that power might be fire. The battle between Ace and Blackbeard was described as â€œthe sun versus darkness,â€ and the so-called â€œundying flameâ€ is referred to as the â€œMother Flame.â€ All of this suggests that in the world of One Piece, fire symbolizes the sun. If thatâ€™s true, then it makes perfect sense that Nika is called the â€œSUN GODâ€ â€” https://nitter.net/DawnStussy/status/2023813208910463091#m
